text: nae(hananim)ga malhagil “adam-iyeo! geudaewa geudaeui anaeneun cheongug-e geojuhala. geuligo geudae dul-eun geugos-eseo naon geos(yeolmae)eul wonhaneun gos eodiseodeunji pungjoghi meogdoe i namue gakkai dagagaji malla. geuleol ttae, geudae dul-eun budanghan jadeul jung-ui hanaga doel geos-ila.”
